mapper.insert: insert into image(id, type, document_id, url, path) values(#{id}, #{type}, #{documentId}, #{url}, #{path})
mapper.select: select * from image where document_id=#{documentId} and type=#{type}
mapper.update: update image set type=#{type}, document_id=#{documentId}, url=#{url}, path=#{path} where id=#{id}
